definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: cause, reason, manner—cstr. [[עַל דִּבִרַת]] because of, for the sake of Ec 3:18, Ec 7:14, Ec 8:2; [[עַל־דִּבְרָתִי מַלְכִּי־חֶדֶק]] after the order, or manner, of Melchizedek Ps 110:4 ([[י]] ancient genit. ending, to soften transition in poetry, Ges:§ 90 (3) a); sf. [[דִּבְרָתִי]] my cause, suit Job 5:8.
